Name: Remote Car
Description: The Remote Car is a fun and interactive toy that provides hours of entertainment for kids and adults alike. It features a sleek design and smooth controls for easy maneuverability.
battery_backup: The Remote Car comes with a rechargeable battery that provides a backup of up to 2 hours of continuous playtime. It can be easily recharged using the included USB cable, ensuring uninterrupted fun.

Name: Super SUV
Description: The Super SUV is a powerful and versatile toy vehicle that provides endless hours of fun. It is designed for both indoor and outdoor play, making it perfect for adventurous kids.
Features: Realistic design with detailed interior and exterior
Compatible with other toy car sets for extended play options
battery_backup: The Super SUV is powered by two AA batteries (not included) and offers a reliable and long-lasting battery backup for extended playtime.

description: The Bugatti Veyron is a high-performance sports car known for its exceptional speed and luxurious design.
battery_backup: The Bugatti Veyron is not an electric vehicle and does not have a battery backup as it relies on a traditional combustion engine.
